about_the_game:
The present add-on will provide you with everything you need to fully equip your hero with artifacts from the Elf Ranger set* and therefore to strengthen your army substantially and to receive an array of economic bonuses.

Items included:
  • Forest Hauberk
  • Ranger's Belt
  • Forest Boots
  • Hood of Forest Gods
  • Holy Clover
  • Woodcutter's Forune
  • Wooden Knuckleduster
  • Elven Bow

* make sure to construct the Vault in your Capital in order to receive the artifacts.
